@1@ Public member function, calls the member function {{tt|do_grouping}} of the most derived class.

@2@ Returns the pattern that determines the grouping of the digits in the monetary output, with the same exact meaning as {{lc|std::numpunct::do_grouping}}.

===Return value===
The object of type {{lc|std::string}} holding the groups. The standard specializations of {{tt|std::moneypunct}} return an empty string, indicating no grouping. Typical groupings (e.g. the {{tt|en_US}} locale) return {{c|"\003"}}.
